name: Coven Tower Defense
description:
Protect your home by summoning turrets to battle invaders!Combine ingredients with the cauldron.
Place the combined material on the Summoning Circle to summon a turret to fight for you!
Frog Turrets deal more damage to the enemy in front of it.
Pumpkin Turrets can pierce through enemies, but deal less damage.
Use the recipe book if you forget!Turrets die if they take too much damage.

Theodore Karl - Programmer

Jack Gianduso - Programmer

Nicolas Munoz - Sound and Music

Vivian Huynh - 3D & 2D Art
